t: Amazon International shopping and shipping made easy
s: International shipping made easy through the Amazon Global program. Amazon Global ships millions of products to over 100 countries worldwide. Simplify customs, track your purchases door-to-door and no hidden imports fees.

t: Amazon IP Accelerator: Trademark support for your brand
s: We created the IP Accelerator program with small and medium businesses in mind. Get help registering your trademark, or work with a service provider to file a copyright or patent application, research potential brand names, or manage an IP dispute.

t: Amazon Global Selling | Sell & Ship Products Internationally - Amazon
s: What is Amazon Global Selling? It's a program that allows you to sell your products internationally through Amazon. Providing you with direct access to millions of customers around the world.

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - New beta feature allows customers to use their Amazon Shopping app to complete purchases from other brand retailer websites if Amazon doesn’t sell the item directly.
